Harpy.name: Lucia
Harpy.description: The 'sune stands closer to six feet than five and has a look of polite disinterest on her face. Her hair is a dark brown with blonde highlighted bangs but cut short to fit in a space helmet much like would be appropriate to match up with that form fitting and full body covering ship suit she's wearing. Even her tails seem to be sheathed inside that utilitarian outfit of hers.
